Left 4 Dead was one of the funniest games I've ever played, after the success of Half-Life 1 and 2, Valve is in another FPS game and comes with the Left 4 Dead, is a zombie game in the first person , You can play from 2 offline, and from 4 online, the graphics are a bit over the top for the time, more if the game leaves something to be desired in graphics, it compensates in fun, plays this game with 1 friend offiline same, is very good , You get desperate in a few moments, especially when the game is on Hard, and a Tank or Witch of life appears, the gameplay works very well, has many map in the game, many zombie on screen, and a large variety of Special Zombies, Tank , Witch, Hunter, and etc, is worth playing.

L4D2 may have many more features and be better game play waise, but I just like this more, no Gauntlet Crescendo Events where you have to run and run to pass them that make you miss details, and the 'atmosfear' just feels better. Miss this game, was (still is) one of the greats.

Eu sempre penso que vou enjoar, mas jogar com amigos é sempre revigorante em Left 4 Dead. Às vezes vocês estão mais conversando do que jogando, só que não tem problema, porque a atmosfera do jogo proporciona esse clima calmo. Eu sei que é uma temática do zumbis, mas ainda sim o jogo é chiiling. Não estamos falando de The Last of Us.
A engine Source é uma delícia e leve. Nada de novo aí. E ainda temos mapas da comunidade para variar.

Left 4 Dead é muito divertido. Meio que obrigatório estar presente na biblioteca de qualquer usuário na Steam.

Fantastic and fun game. Feels like Counter Strike just with zombies and special infected as your opponents. Great weapons of choice, don't need more. I like the dark and scary scenario, it feels just like night of the living dead. Great and fun campaigns. Awesome single-player-mode as well as co-op. You can even play as special infected. And it's one of those games you can play over and over again. Hours of fun.
Love this game, so many details in the first version compared to l4d2, first game maps, I love it <3
